title: Unable to use spack install in Mock environments without tty

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
<!-- Explain, in a clear and concise way, the command you ran and the result you were trying to achieve.
Example: "I ran `spack find` to list all the installed packages and ..." -->
I am using spack in a mock environment to create binaries for different mellanox driver versions of a custom package.

spack install runs into the below error in the mock environment because it is not a tty.
```
spack --debug --stacktrace install mvapich2-gdr@2.3.4~core_direct+mcast~openacc cuda_version=9.2 distribution=mofed4.7 pmi_version=pmi1 process_managers=mpirun target=x86_64

lib/spack/llnl/util/tty/log.py:667 ==> [2020-07-11-01:10:37.054569, 159427] Error: Exception occurred in writer daemon!
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/packager/spack-related/t9nLc716YPXKfDjPCuyWe6lgJ7beg0z03dtXOmvWaqCzJcjbJRMWWjlDeqL0zHx5LM5kl9gVlHXRcPZonbEXmJKSDuu6f0nIBre52X1Sc6AXI9B3fysJRLFbYPgfkCojXIpM2yHnmm3Oz4qglrenXvV3K3sQ7fRMz47bWjKulfZUlQAHkOUl4QekUzs44Mxe4wvTNYPe/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/tty/log.py", line 615, in _writer_daemon
    with keyboard_input(stdin) as kb:
  File "/home/packager/spack-related/t9nLc716YPXKfDjPCuyWe6lgJ7beg0z03dtXOmvWaqCzJcjbJRMWWjlDeqL0zHx5LM5kl9gVlHXRcPZonbEXmJKSDuu6f0nIBre52X1Sc6AXI9B3fysJRLFbYPgfkCojXIpM2yHnmm3Oz4qglrenXvV3K3sQ7fRMz47bWjKulfZUlQAHkOUl4QekUzs44Mxe4wvTNYPe/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/tty/log.py", line 230, in __enter__
    if not self._is_background():
  File "/home/packager/spack-related/t9nLc716YPXKfDjPCuyWe6lgJ7beg0z03dtXOmvWaqCzJcjbJRMWWjlDeqL0zHx5LM5kl9gVlHXRcPZonbEXmJKSDuu6f0nIBre52X1Sc6AXI9B3fysJRLFbYPgfkCojXIpM2yHnmm3Oz4qglrenXvV3K3sQ7fRMz47bWjKulfZUlQAHkOUl4QekUzs44Mxe4wvTNYPe/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/tty/log.py", line 155, in _is_background
    return _is_background_tty(self.stream)
  File "/home/packager/spack-related/t9nLc716YPXKfDjPCuyWe6lgJ7beg0z03dtXOmvWaqCzJcjbJRMWWjlDeqL0zHx5LM5kl9gVlHXRcPZonbEXmJKSDuu6f0nIBre52X1Sc6AXI9B3fysJRLFbYPgfkCojXIpM2yHnmm3Oz4qglrenXvV3K3sQ7fRMz47bWjKulfZUlQAHkOUl4QekUzs44Mxe4wvTNYPe/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/tty/log.py", line 58, in _is_background_tty
    os.getpgrp() != os.tcgetpgrp(stream.fileno())
OSError: [Errno 25] Inappropriate ioctl for device
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
+ Enter a mock environment
+ Run spack install
```

### Possible cause
https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=843434

**I managed to resolve the error and proceed with the installation by making the below diff**
```
[packager@fs5 spack]$ git diff
diff --git a/lib/spack/llnl/util/tty/log.py b/lib/spack/llnl/util/tty/log.py
index 76e07c0..7395562 100644
--- a/lib/spack/llnl/util/tty/log.py
+++ b/lib/spack/llnl/util/tty/log.py
@@ -54,8 +54,8 @@ def _is_background_tty(stream):
     """True if the stream is a tty and calling process is in the background.
     """
     return (
-        stream.isatty() and
-        os.getpgrp() != os.tcgetpgrp(stream.fileno())
+        stream.isatty()# and
+        #os.getpgrp() != os.tcgetpgrp(stream.fileno())
     )
```

### Error Message

<!-- If Spack reported an error, provide the error message. If it did not report an error but the output appears incorrect, provide the incorrect output. If there was no error message and no output but the result is incorrect, describe how it does not match what you expect. -->
```console
<mock-chroot> sh-4.2# spack --debug --stacktrace install mvapich2-gdr@2.3.4~core_direct+mcast~openacc cuda_version=9.2 distribution=mofed4.7 pmi_version=pmi1 process_managers=mpirun target=x86_64
.
.
```
